body_html:
Hi @wt-huang,
using NFS is not a valid solution for me. I want to save the SavedModel to a local NTFS partition mounted at C:.
I tested my script as described above from the command line multiple times and still observe the same error as attached to my original post.

body:
Hi @wt-huang,
using NFS is not a valid solution for me. I want to save the `SavedModel` to a local NTFS partition mounted at `C:`.
I tested my script as described above from the command line multiple times and still observe the same error as attached to my original post.
